function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shifting political divide in addressing the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Influence on compliance levels and measures","Mitigation":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of policies to changing political landscape","Technologies":"Data analysis and predictive modeling","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Rapid changes in people's behavior and attitudes","Impact":"Influence on compliant behavior and adherence to measures","Mitigation":"Targeted communication and education, reinforcement of social norms","Technologies":"Communication platforms, behavioral analytics","People":"General public, community leaders","Owner":"Public health organizations, community organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in the impact of political views on compliance","Impact":"Potential fluctuations in compliance levels based on political views","Mitigation":"Long-term monitoring, adaptive policy making, targeted interventions","Technologies":"Data analysis, predictive modeling, sentiment analysis","People":"General public, policymakers","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions"}]}
